items.title: In a frozen luxury housing market, buyers are asking to ‘try before you buy’ and having sleepovers in multimillion-dollar mansions
items.description: Sellers are trying new tactics to get the most money for their homes.

items.title: Klarna CEO says he feels ‘gloomy’ because AI is developing so quickly it’ll soon be able to do his entire job
items.description: “My work to me is a super important part of who I am,” Sebastian Siemiatkowski said.

items.title: Hyundai and Kia on the hook for $500 million-plus, millions of anti-theft repairs
items.description: Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison announced the settlement, which was reached with 35 states.

items.title: Texas sues utility that caused largest wildfire in state history, over $1 billion in damages

items.title: 33-year-old woman charged with attempted mayhem after Mississippi Walmart sells razorblade bread
items.description: “The health and safety of our customers is always a top priority,” Walmart said in a statement.
